articles.title: Study finds stress linked to increased risk of getting COVID-19 - ANI News
articles.description: Nottingham [UK], January 15 (ANI): A new study has found that people who went through extreme stress, anxiety, and depression at the beginning of the pandemic had an increased risk of getting COVID-19.

articles.title: Prolonged exposure to air pollution may spike Covid risk - Ahmedabad Mirror
articles.description:
Long term exposure to ambient air pollution may heighten the risk of Covid-19 infection, suggests a research.
